ARABIC: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You receive the Qur'an directly from One who is All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You have been conveyed the Qur'an from One all-wise and all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for you, (O Muhammad), you are receiving the Qur'an from the Most Wise, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you have certainly received the Quran from the All-wise and All-knowing One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), are taught the Qur’an from the Wise, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, you are being taught the Qur'an from One, All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely you are made to receive the Quran from the Wise, the Knowing Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou receivest the Koran from One All-wise, All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! as for thee (Muhammad), thou verily receivest the Qur'an from the presence of One Wise, Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You have received this Quran from One who is all-wise, all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thou art receiving the Qur'an) from before the Wise, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed you receive the Quran from One who is all-wise, all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As to thee, the Qur'an is bestowed upon thee from the presence of one who is wise and all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, you (O Muhammad SAW) are receiving the Quran from the One, All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You have received the Koran from the Wise, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are receiving the Quran from an All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, [O Muhammad], you receive the Qur'an from one Wise and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:6] And truly you — this is an address to the Prophet (s) — are receiving the Qur’ān, it is being transmitted to you intensely, from One Wise, Knowing, in such [transmission].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! as for thee) Muhammad, (thou verily receivest the Qur'an) He says: Gabriel comes down to you with the Qur'an (from the presence of One Wise) in His command and judgement, (Aware) of His created beings.
